testcase.name: getting balance for a new player added with £500 to the GameLedger gives £500()
getting locations for a player returns a single undeveloped location if a player has only one undeveloeprd location()
getting balance for a player with £200 credit and £150 debt has £50 credit in total()
getting balance for a player with no credit pays rent of 200()
get balance for a player not on GameLedger returns zero()
getting locations for a player returns an empty list if a player hasnt bought any()
